# Load packages

```{r packages}
library(bipartite)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
```

# Read data

```{r read}

# ind-sp
nets_names <- list.files(path = here("networks/standardized/"), pattern = "_int")
nets <- list()

for (i in 1:length(nets_names)){
  net_file <- paste0("networks/standardized/", nets_names[[i]])
  net <- read.csv(here(net_file))
  
  if(ncol(net)<2){
    net <- read.csv(here(net_file), sep = ";") 
  } else
  {}  

  net %<>% column_to_rownames("ind")
  nets[[i]] <- net #add to list
  names(nets)[i] <- nets_names[[i]]

}


# sp-sp
nets_names_sp <- list.files(path = here("networks/standardized/"), pattern = "stsp_")
nets_sp <- list()

for (i in 1:length(nets_names_sp)){
  net_file <- paste0("networks/standardized/", nets_names_sp[[i]])
  net <- read.csv(here(net_file))
  
  if(ncol(net)<2){
    net <- read.csv(here(net_file), sep = ";") 
  } else
  {}  

  net %<>% column_to_rownames("sp")
  nets_sp[[i]] <- net #add to list
  names(nets_sp)[i] <- nets_names_sp[[i]]

}

# test rounding interactions in network
net.test <- nets[c(20)]
for (i in seq_along(net.test)){
  temp <- net.test[[i]]
  temp2 <- round(temp*100,0)
  net.test[[i]] <- temp2
}

```

# Modularity and nestedness (NODF) calculation

```{r mod.nodf}
metric.info <- data.frame(matrix(ncol = 7, nrow = length(nets)))
x <- c("network", "M", "z_M", "pvalue_M", "NODF", "z_NODF", "pvalue_NODF")
colnames(metric.info) <- x

total = length(nets)

pb = txtProgressBar(min = 0, max = total, initial = 0, title = "Progress Bar", label="0% done", style=3) 

for(i in 1:length(nets)){
  metric.info$network[i] <- names(nets[i])
  
  null <- nullmodel(nets[[i]], N=100, method="vaznull") # null model  
  
  # modularity (M) computation
  mod <-computeModules(nets[[i]])
  metric.info$M[i] <- mod@likelihood
  
  mod.null <- sapply(null, computeModules)
  like.null <- sapply(mod.null, function(x) x@likelihood) 
  z.mod <- (mod@likelihood - mean(like.null))/sd(like.null)
  metric.info$z_M[i] <- z.mod
  
  p.mod <- sum(like.null > mod@likelihood) / length(like.null)
  metric.info$pvalue_M[i] <- p.mod

  # nestedness (wNODF) computation
  nodf <-networklevel(nets[[i]], index="weighted NODF")
  metric.info$NODF[i]<- nodf
  
  nodf.null <- sapply(null, networklevel, index="weighted NODF")
  z.nodf <- (nodf - mean(nodf.null))/sd(nodf.null)
  metric.info$z_NODF[i] <- z.nodf
  
  p.nodf <- sum(nodf.null > nodf) / length(nodf.null)
  metric.info$pvalue_NODF[i] <- p.nodf
  
  setTxtProgressBar(pb,i)
}
getwd()
write.csv(metric.info, here("metrics/mod_nest_metrics.csv"))
```
